title: Wishlist
alt: Disappointed that they caved to fan pressure and went with Ruth Bader Ginsburg over Elena Kagan.
transcript:
[In a frame a bullet-list is shown:]
Mario/Luigi hybrid
The SkiFree monster
Siri
Ellie from Up
Zordon
Clippy
The Sarlaac
The InstallShield Wizard
Mr. Clean
Comet Cursor
Beto O'Rourke
The Monopoly boot
Lot's wife
D.B. Cooper
The Blair Witch
Mavis Beacon[Caption below the frame:]
Super Smash Brothers never did end up adding anyone from my wishlist.
